resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103351</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103351</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hurricanes on sandy shorelines: Lessons for development</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hurrikane auf sandigen Shorelines: Lektionen
für Entwicklung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouragans sur les rivages arénacés : 
Leçons pour le développement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Furacões em shorelines arenosos: Lições 
para o desenvolvimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uragani sugli shorelines sabbiosi: Lezioni 
per sviluppo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τυφώνες στις αμμώδεις ακτές: Μαθήματα για την 
ανάπτυξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Huracanes en litorales arenosos: Lecciones 
para el desarrollo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Carolina Environmental Diversity Explorations "virtual field trip" that examines the sand sharing system of sedimentary coastlines and the impact of hurricanes on those coastlines and on human development.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine virtuellen Carolina fangen die 
Klimaverschiedenartigkeit-Erforschungen "Reise" auf, die den Sand 
überprüft, der System der sedimentären Küstenlinien und die 
Auswirkung von Hurrikanen auf jene Küstenlinien und auf menschliche 
Entwicklung teilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorations environnementales "voyage d'une 
diversité de la Caroline de zone virtuel" qui examinent le sable 
partageant le système des littoraux sédimentaires et l'impact des 
ouragans sur ces littoraux et sur le développement humain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorações ambientais "desengate de uma 
diversidade de Carolina de campo virtual" que examinam a areia que 
compartilha do sistema de coastlines sedimentary e do impacto dos 
furacões naqueles coastlines e no desenvolvimento humano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazioni ambientali "viaggio di diversità 
della Carolina di campo virtuale" che esaminano la sabbia che 
ripartisce il sistema delle linee costiere sedimentarie e l'effetto 
degli uragani su quelle linee costiere e su sviluppo umano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνήσεις "εικονικό ταξίδι μιας περιβαλλοντικές 
ποικιλομορφίας της Καρολίνας πεδίων" που εξετάζουν την άμμο 
μοιραμένος το σύστημα των ιζηματωδών ακτών και τον αντίκτυπο των 
τυφώνων σε εκείνες τις ακτές και στην ανθρώπινη ανάπτυξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exploraciones ambientales "disparo al campo de una
diversidad de Carolina virtual" que examinan la arena que comparte el 
sistema de líneas de la costa sedimentarias y el impacto de huracanes
en esas líneas de la costa y en el desarrollo humano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DIRK FRANKENBURG
FN:DIRK FRANKENBURG
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103351</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/hurricanes-on-sandy-shorelines-lessons-for-development</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
